step_data.thought: I've already clicked on the 'Share' button and then clicked on the textbox containing the link to the current map view. The textbox with bid '318' is now focused and contains the URL 'http://openstreetmap.example.com/#map=8/42.894/-75.795'. Since the user wants to share this link, I should select all the text and copy it to the clipboard. I can do this by pressing Ctrl+A (or Command+A on Mac) to select all text followed by Ctrl+C (or Command+C on Mac) to copy it. I'll use 'ControlOrMeta+a' which will work on both Windows/Linux and Mac.
